sentence.Network_en: There was the same refinement of brow and nostril in both.
sentence.Network_cn: 两人的额头和鼻梁同样细嫩.

sentence.Network_en: The nose : beautifully formed otherwise, was very slightly pinched at the top of each nostril.
sentence.Network_cn: 那鼻子若不是在两道鼻翼上略微凹下了些,便可以算得上漂亮.

sentence.Network_en: On the paralyzed side the ear is pendulous, the eye partly closed, and the nostril immobilized.
sentence.Network_cn: 在麻痹的一侧,耳下垂; 眼半闭, 鼻孔不运动.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English nosterl, nosthyrl, from nosu 'nose' + thȳr(e)l 'hole'

entry.def: Your nostrils are the two openings at the end of your nose.

means.word_mean: 1. either one of the two external openings to the nasal cavity in the nose
